attributes.action: introduce legislation enforcing a minimum national annual pay / pension / benefit rise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the constant year on year increase in council tax, other taxes and the councils and local governments introducing more chargin schemes whenever possible, there should be legislation enforcing a minimum national payrise every year to fall in line with inflation + the increase in tax from both local and national government

The public cannot keep giving more and more money to the government for less and less services whilst not earning any more money.

This should also apply to pensions and benefits. as You want to charge more you have to make sure we get paid more so we can afford to pay more.

Alternatively you can just cap all tax and charge rises and stop screwing every last penny out of us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
